briefdescription.para: Gets whether the Lua engine is enabled or not.
Gets the list of channels the bot is on.
Gets or sets the thread pool.
This is not an unused constructor. Called through singleton!
Creates a new instacne of Alaris bot.
Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the AlarisBot is reclaimed by garbage collection.
Reads and parses the specified config file.
Establishes the connection to the previously specified server.
Method run when the bot is registered to the IRC server.
The method called when a public message occurs in one of the channels the bot is on.

parameterdescription.para: The data about the user who sent the message.
The channel where the message occured.

briefdescription.para: Disconnects the bot from the IRC server.
Sends the given message to the specified channel.
Method run when the bot receives a CTCP request.

parameterdescription.para: Data about the user who sent it.
